mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Negley, George Patient Age: 28. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Incised wound of right foot. Location Wounded: Near Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/12/14. Nature of Wound: an axe - accidental. Result: Returned to duty.
